title: Web-Based Health Promotion Education Program for Nurses: Simulation Learning Utilizing Gamification

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical terminology and clinical experience as a licensed nurse
context.additional_context: Conducted in a web-based learning environment using personal devices (laptops/tablets), combining virtual simulations and gamification elements for health promotion education

learning_goals: Learners can explain chronic disease management strategies with over 80% accuracy via a gamified web-based platform
Learners can design and execute patient education scenarios in a simulation environment to apply health behavior change models
Through project-based assessment, learners develop prototypes for community-based health promotion programs and submit effectiveness analysis reports
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
